## simple fuction

compute z score

```{r}

set.seed(1)

x = rnorm(25)

mean(x) / sd(x)
```

Let's see this as a fuction...

```{r}

z_score = function(x) {
  
  z = mean(x) / sd(x)
  
  z # the things to return
  
}

z_score(x)
z_score(rnorm(1000))

```

unintended argument values ...

```{r}
z_score(19.375)
z_score("my name is jeff")
iris
z_score(iris)
z_score(c(TRUE, TRUE, FALSE, TRUE))
```

Add some sontrol statements

```{r}
z_score = function(x) {
  
  if (!is.numeric(x)) {
    stop("x must be numeric")
  } else if (length(x) < 3) {
    stop("x must have three or more entries")
  }
    
  
  z = mean(x) / sd(x)
  
  z 
  
}
```


Add mean and sd to the output

```{r}
z_score = function(x) {
  
  if (!is.numeric(x)) {
    stop("x must be numeric")
  } else if (length(x) < 3) {
    stop("x must have three or more entries")
  }
    
  mean_x = mean(x)
  sd_x = sd(x)
  z = mean(x) / sd(x)
  
  data_frame(mean = mean_x,
       sd = sd_x,
       z = z)

}

z_score(x)

```
